company_profile.description: Embedded Commerce Platform – Buy Anything, Anywhere
company_profile.business_model: Our tech guarantees 100% attribution on affiliate sales, compared to just 40% through traditional networks.
company_profile.funding_stage: I have a business that I want to scale
company_profile.how_does_your_product_contribute_to_a_he: Shopthru is about fairness, giving content creators and publishers the credit (and revenue) they deserve for the work they put in. Right now, too many of them are losing out to tech giants, voucher plugins, and cashback sites that hijack their efforts. We’re flipping that model by making sure the people who actually drive the sale get rewarded. It’s about levelling the playing field and helping creators build real businesses on their own terms.
company_profile.how_does_your_company_use_innovation__th: We’re the only company in the world that enables consumers to buy directly from a retailer within any environment, ensuring the ‘contract’ remains between the customer and the retailer (MoR), even though the transaction happens outside the retailer’s own platform.
company_profile.please_expand:
We’re currently focused on two key areas:

1) Raising funding to scale the business, and

2) Strategic support to expand our reach within the creator economy.

We’ve gained strong traction with all major UK publishers and have purposely held off on monetising while we refined product-market fit, though commercial terms are signed and ready to activate.

We’re now rolling out our Transactable Storefronts product, including a major partnership with YMU and their roster of high-profile creators.

We believe FlightFund has a strong understanding of this space and would be a natural strategic fit, helping accelerate growth and open doors across the creator economy.
